body_html:
I tried to change the default type to int64 and lots of errors, seems quite a lot of dtype inference/computation depends on int32. I think most super-large tensors are used for embedding_lookup, maybe it's possible to change tf.shape out_type to int64 for some operators like gather and gather gradients.

@yaroslavvb changing default function is one possible solution, thanks.

body:
I tried to change the default type to int64 and lots of errors, seems quite a lot of dtype inference/computation depends on int32. I think most super-large tensors are used for embedding_lookup, maybe it's possible to change tf.shape out_type to int64 for some operators like gather and gather gradients.

@yaroslavvb changing default function is one possible solution, thanks.
